observationTerms.riskDisclosure: Market Risk, Credit Risk, Liquidity Risk
observationTerms.representations: Power to Enter Contract, Authorization to Execute Contract

riskDisclosure.value: Market risk, credit risk, and liquidity risk

representations.value: The buyer and seller represent that they have the power to enter into this contract and that they have taken all necessary action to authorize such execution.

acceptance.value: The buyer and seller acknowledge that they have read and understood the terms and conditions of this contract and that they accept the risks associated with this contract.

masterAgreementType.value: ISDA 2013 Standard Credit Support Annex English Law
